name: Desperate Escape (itch)
description:
Note: This is an old game I made years ago, for some reason I decided to publish it on itchio back in 2016 or something. So yeah, I'm embarrassed by this one...

PS: I can't believe I didn't explain this in game, but you need to click on the inventory items underneath the car in order to put them in. If you don't have all three items and put one or two in, you lose it forever. Such an old broken game of mine, why did I publish this game? Seriously, what was I thinking.

Story: You wake up in an unknown facility, with a flashlight in hand, and monsters lurking around every corner. What'll you do to escape this nightmare?

Known issues: when bumping against an object, your flashlight will move a bit out of place.

Inspired by Monstrum

Credits: Created by Dave_Microwaves_games,

Music by Dave_Microwaves_Games
